metadata.title: CVE-2023-1428 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: There exists an vulnerability causing an abort() to be called in gRPC. Thefollowing headers cause gRPC's C++ implementation to abort() when calledvia http2: te: x (x != trailers) :scheme: x (x != http, https)grpclb_client_stats: x (x == anything) On top of sending one of thoseheaders, a later header must be sent that gets the total header size past8KB. We recommend upgrading past git commit2485fa94bd8a723e5c977d55a3ce10b301b437f8 or v1.53 and above.

criterions.comment: grpc package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
